errorMessage.title: Error Message
errorMessage.description: If success is false, this contains a user-friendly error message to relay directly to the user.

lineItemCount.title: Line Item Count
lineItemCount.description: Total number of line items on this order. Use this to inform the user: "This order has 5 items" or "This order has no line items yet".

lineItems.title: Line Items
lineItems.description: List of all line items for this order, ordered by creation date. Each item includes: Id, Product_Name__c, SKU__c, Quantity__c, Unit_Price__c, Total__c, Fulfillment_Notes__c. The agent should present these to the user with line numbers (1, 2, 3...) for easy reference in follow-up operations like "update line item 2".

message.title: Message
message.description: Human-readable message describing the result. Use this exact message to inform the user. Example: "Customer Order retrieved successfully with 5 line items".

objectType.title: Object Type
objectType.description: The Salesforce object type, always "CustomerOrders__c" for Customer Order read operations. Useful for agent context and logging.

record.title: Record
record.description: The Customer Order record with all field data. Use this to show order details to the user including Name, Status, Dates, Account, Contact, etc.

recordId.title: Record ID
recordId.description: The Salesforce ID of the Customer Order that was read (18-character format).

relatedAccountName.title: Related Account Name
relatedAccountName.description: Name of the related Account if the Order is linked to an Account. Use this to provide context to the user: "Order for Acme Corp".

relatedContactName.title: Related Contact Name
relatedContactName.description: Name of the related Contact if the Order is linked to a Contact. Use this to provide context to the user: "Order for John Smith".

success.title: Success
success.description: True if operation completed successfully, false if an error occurred. Check this before using other output variables.
